name: frontend

outputSchema.framework: string - detected framework (React, Vue, Angular, etc.)
outputSchema.components: array - component files and their types
outputSchema.stateManagement: string - detected state library (Redux, Zustand, etc.)
outputSchema.patterns: array - common patterns found (hooks, HOCs, etc.)

notes: Automatically detects React, Vue, Angular, Svelte
Use for UI-related queries and component analysis
